The '''Embassy of Poland''' in [[Stockholm]] is the diplomatic mission of the [[Poland|Republic of Poland]] to the [[Sweden|Kingdom of Sweden]]. The chancery is located at KarlavÃ¤gen 35, Stockholm.
The main cancery of the Polish embassy in Stockholm is located in the city centre district of [[Ãstermalm]] on a street which borders the [[HumlegÃ¥rden]] park. The building which houses the embassy is a mix of 1920s modernist design and classical architecture which also incorporates a number of elements of the late art deco style such as the heavyly ornamented but functional window surrounds. The consular section which is located at PrÃ¤stgÃ¥rdsgatan 5, in the suburb of [[Sundbyberg]].
The current ambassador of the Polish Republic to the Kingdom of Sweden is Adam HaÅaciÅski.
